item.title: Barrier on St Johns Road by Beverley Court damaged, 23rd January
item.description:
The barrier is damaged and has been like this for months. It has been left open so cars are using it to drive by. This is for emergency use only and should be kept closed. The post is leaning over on the right hand side. Please can this be looked into asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, St Johns Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: Pothole, 23rd January
item.description:
There is a really horrible pothole at this location. Because of the corner/angle it isn't very visible to drivers until the last minute which means people are making wide sudden movements to avoid hitting it. This is incredibly dangerous to cyclists who would be hit as a result.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmers End Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
